headline: Asset tokenization: The 'most convenient' option usually wins
summary: Coinbase Head of Institutional Strategy John D'Agostino sits down with Yahoo Finance executive editor Brian Sozzi for a conversation about the tokenization for various asset classes, a process not exclusive to just crypto. Also catch John D'Agostino describe bitcoin's (BTC-USD) recovery since experiencing liquidity scares in October 2025. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.

content.title: Asset tokenization: The 'most convenient' option usually wins

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.

headline: Bernstein Gives Coinbase (COIN) an Outperform Rating Amid Tokenization Supercycle Outlook
summary: Coinbase Global Inc. (NASDAQ:COIN) is one of the oversold stocks to buy now. On January 6, Bernstein analyst Gautam Chhugani lowered the firm’s price target on Coinbase to $440 from $510, while keeping an Outperform rating on the shares. Bernstein anticipates a tokenization supercycle for 2026, characterized by the migration of the dollar, capital markets, […]
